pr_title: Fix NullPointerException during preconditions validation for Java 9+

timeline.message: Workaround for .contains(null) to prevent npe in java 9+

timeline.author: vgalloy

replies.bodyText: Good point, I think both are readable, but maybe (1) matches the english (if the list contains null)? And we know (1) is generally faster from short circuiting, so I thinking keeping as is, is good.
replies.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText: oh I'm super mistaken, everything I said was wrong. You're right, both short circuit, and the precondition does make more sense. @mpeddada1 can you try this way out?
replies.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the suggestion! Applied the change.
replies.author: mpeddada1
